name: $planned
desc: The Patient is present for the encounter, however is not currently meeting with a practitioner.

name: $arrived
desc: The patient has been assessed for the priority of their treatment based on the severity of their condition.

name: $triaged
desc: The Encounter has begun and the patient is present / the practitioner and the patient are meeting.

name: $in-progress
desc: The Encounter has begun, but the patient is temporarily on leave.

name: $finished
desc: The Encounter has ended before it has begun.

name: $cancelled
desc: This instance should not have been part of this patient's medical record.

name: $entered-in-error
desc: The encounter status is unknown. Note that "unknown" is a value of last resort and every attempt should be made to provide a meaningful value other than "unknown".
